headline: EA SPORTS™ Announces Plans for Future EA SPORTS F1® Experiences, Including 2026 FIA Formula One World Championship™ Season Expansion & All-New F1 Game in 2027
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., November 18, 2025--Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ: EA) today confirmed plans for the future of the EA SPORTS™ F1® game series, the official games of the FIA Formula One World Championship™. Since launch, EA SPORTS™ F1® 25 has received praise from players, media, content creators, F1 drivers and more. Now looking forward, players in F1 25 will be able to expand their experience next year with the full 2026 FIA Formula One World Championship™. Coming in 2026 as a paid expansion
